TextView.android:text:
1. View effects from other cards that affect current token.
 2. Create a new token.
 3. Current player's turn, either player's or opponent's.
 4. Select a token by browsing categories, searching for specific attributes, or viewing recently used tokens.
 5. Pass turn to opponent. Taps, removes summoning sickness, etc if necessary. Only usable when token is selected.
 6. Begin new upkeep for yourself. Untaps, removes summoning sickness, etc if necessary. Only usable when token is selected.
 7. Decrement total number of tokens in play. Only usable when token is selected.
 8. Press 'total' to manually set the number of tokens and which phase they are in. Only usable when token is selected.
 9. Counters for number of tokens in each phase. Also opens menus to decrement, increment, remove, and tap/untap tokens as necessary. The phases are,from left to right: attacking, blocking, ready, summoning sick, and tapped.
 10. Increment total number of tokens in play. Only usable when token is selected.
